title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and User Login
summary: Implement a secure login system using multi-factor authentication methods to protect user accounts.
description: Develop a robust authentication system that ensures secure user access leveraging multiple verification mechanisms such as passwords, one-time passcodes, or biometric methods. Implement encryption for credentials, session management, automatic logout on inactivity, and device recognition for additional security. This will protect customers from unauthorized access, aligning with banking compliance and information security standards.

title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Develop a responsive portal interface that offers a personalized experience across all devices.
description: Design and implement a responsive web interface optimized for desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Provide a personalized dashboard displaying key account information, eligible financial products, and relevant services based on user profiles. Ensure a clean layout, easy navigation, and accessibility compliance for differently abled users. The dashboard must be interactive and tailored to customer preferences for improved engagement.

title: Core Banking Integration and High-Performance Database
summary: Integrate the new self-service portal with the core banking system while maintaining portal-specific data storage.
description: Build secure integration pipelines with the core banking system using APIs or middleware layers. Develop and optimize a dedicated portal database for handling user requests, caching, and data storage to improve responsiveness and reliability. Ensure bidirectional data sync, handle API throttling gracefully, and maintain fault tolerance. Establish monitoring mechanisms to detect integration failures and ensure business continuity.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Create streamlined digital workflows for account openings and service modification requests.
description: Build a guided workflow system that allows customers to open accounts, modify existing services, and submit formal requests with minimal clicks. Implement input validation, autofill from user profiles, and backend workflow orchestration for routing approvals. Provide draft saving functionality to allow users to pause and resume applications later. Integrate approval automation rules to reduce processing times and human workloads.

title: Secure Document Upload and File Management System
summary: Enable customers to upload required documentation securely through the self-service interface.
description: Implement a file upload feature within customer workflows to allow submission of KYC documents and proofs. Support multiple formats with file size restrictions, validation, and secure transfer protocols. Store documents using encrypted storage solutions, ensuring compliance with data protection laws. Provide status indicators for document review, and enable re-uploading or replacement if documents are invalid or outdated.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notification Engine
summary: Implement real-time tracking and status notification for user requests and submissions.
description: Develop a centralized notification and request tracking system that provides customers with up-to-date status information on submitted applications, modifications, or uploads. Integrate with email and SMS gateways to provide real-time updates and reminders. Display request statuses in the dashboard with interactive progress indicators and full audit trails. Ensure notification preferences can be customized per individual user.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all user interactions within the portal for transparency and compliance.
description: Develop a historical activity and audit logging module that records every action a customer performs within the portal, including requests, updates, and authentication events. Provide both customer-facing history views and administrative audit reports. Ensure logs are immutable and timestamped for regulatory compliance and can be easily retrieved during investigations or customer support interactions.

title: Role-Based Access and Authorization Controls
summary: Implement a robust role-based access control mechanism for managing user permissions and data visibility.
description: Design and deploy a role-based access control (RBAC) layer that governs the visibility and accessibility of portal features. Assign conditional access based on predefined roles such as customer, agent, or administrator. Enforce granular permission sets for data interactions and ensure integration with MFA and core banking authorizations. The system must be easily extendable to accommodate future role types or new features.

title: End-to-End Data Security and Compliance Framework
summary: Establish a comprehensive security framework to ensure privacy, data integrity, and regulatory compliance.
description: Implement security protocols that ensure the confidentiality and integrity of financial and personal data. Apply encryption at rest and in transit, adopt secure development practices, and introduce continuous vulnerability scanning. Incorporate compliance checks with PCI DSS, GDPR, and local banking regulations. Enable centralized security monitoring, incident response mechanisms, and compliance reporting to support governance teams.
